code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import{Menu,X}from'lucide-react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import'./Header.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const[scrolled,setScrolled]=useState(false);const[isMobileMenuOpen,setIsMobileMenuOpen]=useState(false);const location=useLocation();useEffect(()=>{const handleScroll=()=>{const offset=window.scrollY;if(offset>50){setScrolled(true);}else{setScrolled(false);}};window.addEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);return()=>{window.removeEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);};},[]);const menuItems=[{name:'Solar',href:'/solar'},{name:'BESS',href:'/bess'},{name:'CBG',href:'#cbg'},{name:'About Us',href:'#about'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"header ".concat(scrolled||location.pathname==='/solar'||location.pathname==='/bess'||location.pathname==='/cbg'||location.pathname==='/about'?'scrolled':''),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/images/cleanco_logo_f.png",alt:"CLEANCO Logo"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"nav-links",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/solar",className:location.pathname==='/solar'?'active':'',children:"Solar"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/bess",className:location.pathname==='/bess'?'active':'',children:"BESS"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/cbg",className:location.pathname==='/cbg'?'active':'',children:"CBG"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/about",className:location.pathname==='/about'?'active':'',children:"About Us"})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"get-started-btn",children:"Get Started"})]})});};export default Header;
